titles.title: To provide a temporary exception for certain Minnesota counties from the limitation on the percentage of cropland that may be enrolled in the conservation reserve and wetlands reserve programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 7/21/1999--Introduced. Provides a temporary exception for the Minnesota counties of Roseau, Pennington, and Marshall from the limitation on the cropland percentage that may be enrolled in the conservation reserve and wetlands reserve programs.
